# `PutDecisionTableRowRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| inputs | `object` | No | The full updated input values of the row. The key for this map is the column ID the row value relates. Column IDs are available from the decision table entity |
| outputs | `object` | No | The full updated output values of the row. The key for this map is the column ID the row value relates. Column IDs are available from the decision table entity |
